lead_paragraph: Several hundred people attended a meeting at Lancaster Central High School to discuss whether to change the school’s nickname and mascot, which have been in use since 1953.
snippet: Several hundred people attended a meeting at Lancaster Central High School to discuss whether to change the school’s nickname and mascot, which have been in use since 1953.
